page.title: 02The Oldest Inhabitant
page.content: Mrs R has lived in Garton all her life.She likes Garton because it is quiet and peaceful but she thinks the village could be tidier. The village was very different in 1910.In those days Garton had a public house and fresh bread was baked by four people.She remembers 1935 because people had a better standard of living.They went regularly to church and chapel but not many people go now. She hasn't seen many changes over the years; some new houses have been built and old ones knocked down. She remembers buying a 6 ton truck of coal for Â£9.00 and is horrified at the price of a bag now.She mentioned that the children are better dressed with plenty of toys.She thinks they are very friendly but perhaps not so polite as they used to be.
